p: Phytocannabinoids canabigerol (CBG) and cannabidivarin (CBDV) are the most promising candidates as neuroprotectants, while Δ9-tetrahydrocannabivarin (Δ9-THCV), Δ9-THCA, cannabichromene (CBC), and cannabinol (CBN) have limited but encouraging data as neuroprotectants. However, little is known with neuroprotective potential of CBDA [ 109].
